channel.title: Comments on: Let It Never Be Said That Steven Patrick Morrissey Lacks a Way with Words

item.title: By: Gail
item.dc:creator: Gail
item.description: I like his sense of humor. I know that Steven Morrissey is excited and looking forward to touring and i'm excited for him. Wish him 100 % recovery...
item.content:encoded: I like his sense of humor. I know that Steven Morrissey is excited and looking forward to touring and i’m excited for him. Wish him 100 % recovery…
